text:
When configured as a service in NT(2000), all logging output is not enabled - 
server startup logs, webapps logs, and individual logging facility (log4j).

The service was configured as //US//Tomcat5 with option --Java "path to 
{client/server}/jvm.dll".

JVM was 1.4.2_02 (Sun JDK).
creator: waimun@go.com

text:
I noticed this as well.

The old tomcat.exe from Tomcat 4.1.29 (aka JavaService) does not exhibit this
issue (nor the other one where the lack of tools.jar in the path causes
compilationo issues).
creator: jessh@ptc.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 26808 ***
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com

text: Changed resolution to INVALID since duplicate bug has been deleted from Bugzilla and leaving as DUPLICATE creates referential integrity issues for the underlying database.
creator: markt@apache.org
